name: Oksigen Lab
goal: Oksigen Lab is non-profit accelerator and a research lab for soci(et)al entrepreneurship. Their core business consist of  Business Coaching and support to organisations willing to solve societal challenges in an entrepreneurial way, and of research and knowledge centre for social entrepreneurship and social innovation
interests: Business and Industry, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives:
social enrepreneurship and innovatuion:
- Geces
- EASI projects
- FP7 projects: Benisi, Seforis
- Selusi
